snippet: The United States Coast Guard was sent to rescue the crew of the Geraldton Western Australia, which was hit by an enormous wave 400 miles off the coast of California during the Clipper 11-12 Round the World Yacht Race.
abstract: The United States Coast Guard was sent to rescue the crew of the Geraldton Western Australia, which was hit by an enormous wave 400 miles off the coast of California during the Clipper 11-12 Round the World Yacht Race.

headline.main: Coast Guard Rescues Sailors Whose Yacht Was Overtaken by Wave
